scholar_desc: This character leads the life of a scholar, poring over books and corresponding with the finest minds in the known world.
EVTOPTA_WOL_2100_3: Midgets, shoes... No! [target_spy_on.GetFirstName] is having an affair with a feisty goat!
EVTOPTA_WOL_2100_5: [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap] murdered a childhood friend at the tender age of 11!
EVTOPTA_WOL_2100_6: [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap] has an imaginary friend called Bappo!
EVTOPTA_WOL_2100_8: [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap] leads a secret life as a prostitute in a brothel in [target_spy_on.Capital.Capital.GetName]!
EVTOPTB_WOL_2071: Aha! Now I can call off my spies.
EVTOPTF_WOL_2080: I see, but I think it is time to spy on someone else.
EVTOPTC_WOL_2100: No... I think it is time to spy on someone else.
EVTDESC_WOL_2065: I am not having much luck spying on [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. Perhaps I should focus my efforts elsewhere?
EVTOPTB_WOL_2065: No, I am sure [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] is up to something...
EVTDESC38313: The pressures of life no longer seem so overwhelming. I am not Stressed anymore!
EVTDESC38314: I woke up this morning with a big smile on my face. I am no longer Depressed!
PICK_FOCUS_DESC: You will not be able to change Focus again for §Y$YEARS$§! years!
EVTDESC_WOL_3052: My [GetFromFromRelation], [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], has asked me to spend some quality family time in [FromFrom.Capital.Capital.GetName]. I am sure the idea is for me to become better friends with [From.GetTitledName]...
desc_magnificent_maze: This character's beautiful garden maze is known far beyond the realm for it's beauty.
EVTOPTG_WOL_10221: [stonemason.GetSheHeCap] is not here right now. [stonemason.GetSheHeCap]'s got more important matters to deal with.
duel_tooltip_busy: None of the duellers can be busy or fighting a war.\n
duel_tooltip_sickness: Must be in a healthy condition.\n
duel_tooltip_fought_before: Have not duelled each other before.\n
duel_tooltip_valid_target: Is a valid duel target in your religion or culture.\n
duel_tooltip_recent_duel: None of the duellers had a recent duel.\n
dishonest_duel_tooltip: This is considered dishonest and people might be upset about this act.
duel_tooltip_excommunicated: Has the trait '§YZealous§!' and target is §YExcommunicated§! in the same religion.\n
EVTOPTB_WOL_11110: No, I don't want to fight my friends.
desc_wol_duel_training: This character has recently been training the arts of duelling.
